body:
# **MoonDAO CN Translation & Bridge: Q4 2023 Final Report **

Reference: [MoonDAO Final Report Reference](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16F-_bcC0C4889YmuQl6WWChDKQObHhmfjasDna0wOmk/edit?usp=sharing)

Original Proposal: [CN Translation & Bridge Project Q4 2023](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xZBRiIEyY8MLMEtPGmnz-YuPsokF-8TdYwuTSd9USzM/edit?usp=sharing)****


## Summary

This project aimed to bridge the communication between CN and EN community, translated all the proposals in CN version in time, and let the large CN community members understand what they voted for. The monthly AMA gave the chance to core contributors and community members to communicate directly, helping both sides to understand each other. Translated the announcements in time and distributed them in different channels(Telegram, Wechat group, Discord CN etc) to help the CN members get the instant information. Operated also the MoonDAO Twitter CN. Tried to find a AI tool to translate the Townhall. 


## Results

1. **Objective:** Translate the documents in CN version

   1. **Key Result**: Translate all proposals in CN versions in time

      1. **Results**: all the proposals were translated from team members and reviewed for guarantee the high quality and accuracy, the summary/overview of translated documents and proposals:[Translation\&Bridge Project-2023Q4.xlsx](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Gfeq1jsNSKMFhXHXg5cf2q1ywTxNOdYd/edit?usp=drive_link\&ouid=102859770157715412789\&rtpof=true\&sd=true)

      2. **Learnings**: the snapshot voting period is 5 mostly days, need to translate the proposals and distribute them in time, otherwise the CN community members had no enough time to review the proposals for voting

      3. **Maintenance**: no

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 1

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: translated the proposals with team members in the overview with name: [Translation\&Bridge Project-2023Q4.xlsx](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Gfeq1jsNSKMFhXHXg5cf2q1ywTxNOdYd/edit?usp=drive_link\&ouid=102859770157715412789\&rtpof=true\&sd=true) Reviewed the most proposals to guarantee the accuracy. \
**DaMian**: no**Maccon**: translated proposals in a timely manner,see detailed work in excel sheet\
**Ming**: translated proposals in a timely manner

2. **Key Result**: Translate the newsletter, meeting notes, project V4 and other updated MoonDAO docs in CN

   1. **Results**: newsletter project was stopped for while. All the needed documents were translated to CN version for better understanding for CN members, the overview for the documents were also included in this excel file:[Translation\&Bridge Project-2023Q4.xlsx](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Gfeq1jsNSKMFhXHXg5cf2q1ywTxNOdYd/edit?usp=drive_link\&ouid=102859770157715412789\&rtpof=true\&sd=true)

   2. **Learnings**: need to translate the documents in time and guarantee the accuracy, otherwise the translation will lead the misunderstanding.

   3. **Maintenance**: no

   4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 1

   5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: overview of the translation tasks with my name [Translation\&Bridge Project-2023Q4.xlsx](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Gfeq1jsNSKMFhXHXg5cf2q1ywTxNOdYd/edit?usp=drive_link\&ouid=102859770157715412789\&rtpof=true\&sd=true), and reviewed most documents from team members.\
**DaMian**: Updated the MoonDAO constitution.**Maccon**: translated related docs in a timely manner, detailed work in excel sheet\
**Ming**: translated related documents in a timely manner****

3. **Key Result**: Distribute the CN version documents to different channels

   1. **Results**: distributed the documents and proposals in Wechat group, Telegram, Discord CN channel and some also in the Twitter CN MoonDAO. 

   2. **Learnings**: 

   3. **Maintenance**: no

   4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 1

   5. **Team Contributions** 

**Ballack**: Distributed the documents and proposals in the Telegram, Discord CN channel, some also in the Twitter CN MoonDAO.\
**DaMian**: Distribute the latest snapshot vote and CN-version to 提案 channel**Maccon**: distributed the CN version documents to CN wechat group and answered questions/provided feedback.\
**Ming**: shared translated content to WeChat group, Discord CN channel and Telegram Channel****

4. **Key Result**: Collect questions for these documents and bring them to related contributors

   1. **Results**: one topic from the team 's weekly meeting was the questions from the community, brought the questions to contributors

   2. **Learnings**: need to learn the voices and questions from the community and transfer these voices and questions to contributors.  

   3. **Maintenance**: no

   4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.5 

   5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: 

**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: answered the questions from community members regarding governance structure, New NFT selection and proposals and trying to solve conflicts to reach agreements. encouraged the community to vote and participate in new NFT selection.

**Ming**: not related****

2. **Objective:** Monthly AMA

   1. **Key Result**: Organize the monthly AMA, collecting the questions and translating them beforehand

      1. **Results**: organized 2 monthly AMAs between contributors and CN community, collected the questions and translated them before AMA 

      2. **Learnings**: need to collect the questions 2 weeks before the AMA, let community members have enough time to fill the questions list. Due to the different time zones, its not easy to find a fit AMA time for all members and contributors.

      3. **Maintenance**: no

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 1

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: made the 2 AMAs time agreement between Astronaut and community, collected the questions and translated them before AMA:  **DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: invited people to join AMA, collected questions ahead,remind people to join in time and made translation during AMA

**Ming**: collected questions and attended the meeting****

2. **Key Result**: Consecutive translation/interpretation at AMAs

   1. **Results**: made the interpretation at AMAs

   2. **Learnings**: need to have a back-up translator in case there are connection issues or other emergency issues.

   3. **Maintenance**: no

   4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 1 

   5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: not related\
**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: made translation at  AMAs\
**Ming**: no related****

3. **Key Result**: Translate the AMAs notes to CN and distribute them in different channels

   1. **Results**: no AMA notes, but video record for the AMAs.

   2. **Learnings**: its very difficult to take the AMA notes.

   3. **Maintenance**: no

   4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.5 

   5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: no related\
**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: not related\
**Ming**: not related****

3. **Objective: attend the weekly senate meeting**

   1. **Key Result**: Bring the voice from the CN community to the senate meeting

      1. **Results**: collected the voices from Discord CN channel, Wechat group, transferred those voice to senate meeting.

      2. **Learnings**: due to the time conflict, Maccon and Ming couldn’t attend the senate meeting. 

      3. **Maintenance**: no

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.7

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: attended the weekly senate meeting. collected the voice for executive branch proposal, mutli-sig replacement proposal.\
**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: not related 

**Ming**: not related

2. **Key Result**: Create a bridge between the Senate, the contributors, and the CN community

   1. **Results**: through the monthly AMA gave the chance for contributors and cn community members to communicate directly. 

   2. **Learnings**: due to the different culture, its not easy to build the bridge.

   3. **Maintenance**: no

   4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.6

   5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: organized the AMA. Answer the questions in the official wechat group.\
**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: actively involved and responsive to CN members when they raised questions in wechat group. Coordinated and facilitated communication,encouraged people to vote\
**Ming**: brought questions from CN community to the general channel****

4. **Objective:** CN Telegram Announcement Channel****

   1. **Key Result**: Post the Translated documents in this channel

      1. **Results**: posted all the proposals and announcements in CN versions in this channel  

      2. **Learnings**: need to translate and post these things in time.

      3. **Maintenance**: no

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 1

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: manage this channel, in charge of posting all the proposals and announcements in this channel.\
**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: posted information in CN channels.\
**Ming**: posted a few post in CN channels 

<!--StartFragment-->

5. **Objective:** find a AI-Tool to translate our Town Hall****

   1. **Key Result**: find the tool to translate our Town Hall

      1. **Results**: tested a few tools, but not suitable

      2. **Learnings**: 

      3. **Maintenance**: no

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.2

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ballack**: tested a few AI translation tools\
**DaMian**: not related**Maccon**: not related\
**Ming**: not related

[Link to the Coordinape](https://app.coordinape.com/circles/17562)
